document_data.name: Mierngras
document_data.mainbody: '''Mierngras''' was a flowering plant from the [[Vilhon Reach]] that blossomed in early [[Mirtul]], punctuating the season change in the region.
document_data.Description: Mierngras were low flowering shrubs with beautiful blossoms of violet and gold. These plants flowered once per spring and called "nature's waterclocks" by the inhabitants of [[Chondalwood]].
